results.definition: the position on a baseball team of the player who throws the ball for a batter to try to hit
examples: he has played every position except pitcher

results.definition: (baseball) the person who does the pitching
examples: our pitcher has a sore arm

results.definition: the quantity contained in a pitcher
an open vessel with a handle and a spout for pouring
(botany) a leaf that that is modified in such a way as to resemble a pitcher or ewer
